'''2.1.5819''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]), '''2.1.5816''' ([[wikipedia:macOS|macOS]]), or '''2.1.5815''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]) is a [[launcher]] beta version released on July 16, 2019, which fixed bugs.<ref name=":1">https://piston-meta.mojang.com/mc/launcher_beta_changelog.md</ref>

== Changes ==
* More information about how the launcher starts the game is now logged.

== Fixes ==
* {{Bug|MCL-8702}} - Launcher black screen - ERROR:gl_surface_egl.cc(711)] eglCreateWindowSurface failed with error EGL_BAD_ALLOC
* {{Bug|MCL-10036}} - minecraft launcher does not appear on main display if closed on secondary display which is then disconnected before launch
* Fixed a bug that meant the log files were missing information on macOS.
* Fixed an error where the system language was not properly used by the launcher.
* Fixed a bug causing the Launcher Log window to use up performance when open.
* Fixed a bug where the {{cd|--workDir}} argument did not work on certain systems.
</onlyinclude>
